thread.title: Fan Appreciation Set for Sunday March 23
thread.title_full: Fan Appreciation Set for Sunday March 23

author: Nathan Kanter
title: Fan Appreciation Set for Sunday March 23
text:
Fan Appreciation Set for Sunday March 23
Langley, B.C. – The Vancouver Giants annual Fan Appreciation game presented by White Spot takes place this Sunday afternoon, March 23, at 4 p.m. in the club’s regular season finale against the Kelowna Rockets.
There are plenty of awesome prizing to be won, including:
- A trip for 2 to Las Vegas
- 4 signed Giants jerseys
- Tsawwassen Spring Golf pack
- White Spot prize pack
- $200 The Hockey Shop gift card
- Cinnamon Buns and Bread for a Year from Cobs
- Valley West Stampede 4 weekend passes
- And more!
This year, Team Awards will be presented prior to Sunday’s game, so make sure you arrive early! Doors to the Langley Events Centre will open at 2:30 p.m.
At this time, Vancouver does not know their first round playoff opponent. Keep an eye on the team’s social media channels and website this weekend to find out who.
